text: Jacobus Willem Rentmeester (born 28 February 1936), nicknamed "Co" or "Ko", is a Dutch rower. He later became a photojournalist and covered the Vietnam War among other newsworthy events. He was born in Amsterdam. He competed in the 1960 Olympics. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * Category:1936 births Category:Living people Category:Dutch journalists Category:Olympians for the Netherlands Category:Dutch rowers Category:Photojournalists Category:Sportspeople from Amsterdam Category:War correspondents Category:Writers from Amsterdam
title: Co Rentmeester
